name: combatresearch
title: Combat Research
description:
Damage dealt to your enemies will contribute to your technology research.
Includes settings to scale the effect damage has on research progress, unlocking early research options, and to disable the lab recipe.

[font=default-bold][color=red]The only good bug is a dead bug[/color][/font]
[font=default-small]An update to the original CombatTechnology mod by sjlevin.[/font]
author: Kryptronic
